props.name: aria-label
props.description: Should be utilised for label type tooltips and it is going to be used to label the tooltip trigger.

props.name: direction
props.description: Sets where the tooltip renders in relation to the target.

props.name: noDelay
props.description: When set to `true`, tooltip appears without any delay.

props.name: text
props.description: Should be utilised for description type tooltips and it is going to be used to describe the tooltip trigger.

props.name: type
props.description: The type of tooltip. `label` is used for labelling the element that triggers tooltip. `description` is used for describing or adding a suplementary information to the element that triggers the tooltip.

props.name: wrap
props.description: Use `true` to allow text within tooltip to wrap.
